function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of assessment of precautionary measures at sports club facilities during pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and potential outbreaks among members and visitors","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough risk assessments and implementing appropriate measures to limit the spread of contagious diseases","Technologies":"Use of contactless technology, automated monitoring systems, and sanitation equipment","People":"Members, visitors, staff at sports club facilities","Owner":"Facility management, health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Voluntary implementation of sports facility policies","Impact":"Inconsistent execution of policies and lack of standardized measures for disease prevention and health promotion","Mitigation":"Establishing mandatory guidelines for sports facilities, providing resources for policy implementation, and promoting accountability","Technologies":"Policy management software, monitoring and reporting tools, communication platforms","People":"Managing organizations, government authorities, sports facility staff","Owner":"Government authorities, managing organizations"}]}
